title: RTK1 Jōyō Comparer
description:
RTK1 Jōyō comparer is a website that visualises how much of the Jōyō kanji you know from James Heisig's book "Remembering the Kanji".
Pretty useless, but visualises your progress in a nice way.

title: UtaSuki (歌好き)
description: UtaSuki is a place where people can document their favourite music on a montly basis. This is all began when I started writing down my own favourite music every month since 2020, and with that data I wanted to present it in a nice way. Though nice way may be rather subjective.

title: toralv-dev
description: The website you're looking at. Heavily inspired by my own swaywm setup.
